app_description: Never miss a TV show again with Sofa Time The Ultimate App For Tracking TV Shows And Movies For Trakt! The Sofa Time iOS app is perfect for keeping track of everything you ve watched iGeeksBlog.com Everything you need in one gorgeous app iDownloadBlog.com A Full Featured Movie and TV Tracker appadvice.com With Sofa Time formerly known as TVSofa you can easily keep track of what you re watching discover new shows to watch and stay up to date on the latest releases. Key features: DISCOVER: Explore new TV shows and movies based on genre popularity and more. TRACK: Keep track of which episodes you ve watched and when. STREAMING GUIDE: Find out where to watch movies or TV shows online across over than 500 streaming services worldwide including Apple TV Netflix Hulu Prime Video Disney HBO and more. WATCHLIST: Create a watchlist or personal lists of TV shows and movies you want to watch next. REMINDERS: Don t forget anymore when your favorite TV show is airing again. SOCIAL: Read what other people like you think about other movies or TV shows. RECOMMENDATIONS: Get personalized TV shows and movies recommendations based on your viewing history WIDGETS: Add our exclusive Widgets to your iPhone or iPad to stay up to date. SYNC: Keep everything synced across your devices thankfully to Trakt.tv Whether you re a binge watcher or a casual viewer Sofa Time has everything you need to stay on top of your TV show and movie collection. Download it today and start your watchlist! Please note: You cannot watch series or movies with Sofa Time If you need assistance please contact us at support theclashsoft.com
